schema.description: Request to manually trigger a micro-certification.

reason.description: Reason for manually triggering certification (minimum 10 characters).

reviewer_id.description: Optional specific reviewer. If not provided, reviewer is resolved based on trigger rule.

trigger_rule_id.description: Optional specific trigger rule to use. If not provided, the default rule for Manual trigger type is used.

user_id.description: The user whose access to certify.

schema.title: ManualTriggerRequest
